_meanings:
<ab>N.</ab> of
an ancient town situated on the
right bank of the Yamunā, the
birth-place of Kṛṣṇa and the
scene of his amours and exploits;
it is one of the seven sacred cities 

in India (see {#avaMti#}), and is, to this
day, the favourite resort of 
thousands of devotees. It is said to have
been founded by Śatrughna; {#nirmame#}
{#nirmamorTezu maTurAM maDurAkftiH#} <ls>R. 15. 28</ls>;
{#kaliMdakanyA maTurAM gatA'pi#} 
{#gaMgormisaMsaktajaleva BAti#} <ls n="R.">6. 48.</ls>
